Seniority level
Mid-Senior level
Employment type
Full-time
Job function
Information Technology
Industries
Technology, Information and Internet
job_description:
Job Highlights:

Work in close collaboration with relevant stakeholders to contextualize the architecture design
Work with development teams and product managers to ideate and develop software solutions
Design end-to-end solutions to meet business needs in an operational and ﬁnancially efficient manner
Promote the right usage of company standards, IT industry practices, and emerging standards
Leverage the existing portfolio of digital products, catalogue of services, and promotes the usage of existing building blocks
Design and produce design documents and solution roadmaps showing the transition states
Verify the consideration of nonfunctional requirements as part of the product backlog
Orchestrate the delivery of interconnected technology components through the solution life cycle
Contribute to standards life cycle maintenance

Requirements

Key Functional Requirements & Qualifications:

Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or relevant field
Familiarity with Service-oriented architecture and APIs, experience designing/developing RESTful APIs a plus
Strong experience in Coding (Python, Spark, REST, Golang, Javascript, Java, NodeJS, Angular)
Software best practices (design patterns, dev standards)
Experience using Cloud Containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS ECR/EKS)
Familiarity with AWS data and object stores (e.g. Snowflake, AWS DocumentDB, S3)
Working knowledge of Databricks
Familiarity with Github, SonarQube, Checkmarx, Artifactory, AWS Cloudwatch, Authorization (OAuth, Keycloak, AuthN/AuthZ), & Terraform
Experience with JIRA & Confluence a plus
Deep AI/ML knowledge
